perturbation.original_text: CUSTOMER AGREES TO PAY FOR HOSTING SERVICES ON OR BEFORE THE FIRST DAY OF THE MONTH IN WHICH THE HOSTING SERVICES ARE PROVIDED, except that, with respect to Additional Fees (as defined in Exhibit A), eGain will invoice Customer for such Fees in the month after the month in which such fees accrue as provided in Exhibit A. All amounts payable hereunder are exclusive of any and all taxes, and Customer is responsible for payment of such taxes (excluding taxes based on eGain's net income).
perturbation.changed_text: CUSTOMER AGREES TO PAY FOR HOSTING SERVICES WITHIN 30 DAYS OF RECEIPT OF INVOICE, except that, with respect to Additional Fees (as defined in Exhibit A), eGain will invoice Customer for such Fees in the month after the month in which such fees accrue as provided in Exhibit A. All amounts payable hereunder are exclusive of any and all taxes, and Customer is responsible for payment of such taxes (excluding taxes based on eGain's net income).
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the payment terms. The original text specifies payment on or before the first day of the month, while the modified text changes it to within 30 days of invoice receipt. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty about the actual due date for payment.

perturbation.original_text: Payment received by eGain after the due date shall be subject to a late fee equal to one and one-half percent (1.5%) per month, or, if less, the maximum amount allowed by applicable law.
perturbation.changed_text: Payment received by eGain after the due date shall be subject to a late fee equal to five percent (5%) per month, or, if less, the maximum amount allowed by applicable law.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the late fee from 1.5% to 5% per month creates a direct contradiction. This inconsistency introduces ambiguity and potential disputes over the amount of the late fee that should be applied.

perturbation.original_text: At the end of the initial one-year term of this Agreement and any subsequent one-year terms, eGain may adjust the monthly fee payable under this Agreement by providing Customer written notice of such adjustment at least sixty (60) days prior to the beginning of the new term.
perturbation.changed_text: At the end of the initial one-year term of this Agreement and any subsequent one-year terms, eGain may adjust the monthly fee payable under this Agreement by providing Customer written notice of such adjustment at least thirty (30) days prior to the beginning of the new term.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the advance notice period for fee adjustments from 60 days to 30 days creates conflicting requirements. This introduces uncertainty about the valid notice period for adjusting monthly fees, potentially leading to disagreements.
